page.title: 16EDUCATION A BOARDERS LIFE
page.content: { I get woken up at 7.30am and I get up at about 8am!The breakfast bell goes at 8.05 so everyone makes their way to the dining room.Breakfast ends at about 8.30 then we have till 9 to make our beds,pack our school bags and tidy up.Classes are from 9.10 to 4.10 with a break for lunch 12.25pm to 1.10pm.At 4.10 is meeting point when we can do what we like;chat to friends,watch TV, go to the village shop,play tennis. High tea is 5.30pm.We study and have more free time in the evening.Our days are organised by bells!Weekends give time for activities,matches,videos, shopping visits to Perth and more study!Mass is 9am on Sunday followed by buffet breakfast- a roll and an orange if you are lucky!
